column15: Pigeon - Kitchen Storage  Best Price Rs 1175.00  EMI Rs 196 for 6 months FREE Shipping in 2 Days
column17:
This non-stick and scratch resistant Casserole by Pigeon has a thick base and is made from superior quality aluminium which offer durability. It is metal spoon friendly and chemical free. So cook all your favorite meals with ease in this cookware which is a must-have in your kitchen.Features
  • Material: Aluminium
  • Colour: Black
  • Content: 1 pc casserole
  • Dimension (Diameter in mm): 235
  • Other Features: Comes with sturdy handles Scratch resistant Spiral base for even heating.
Care Instructions: Use a soft scrubber and clean the utensils with baking soda or ground-up lemon peel.
